name: MechJam III Media Pack
description:
This media pack provides resources such as information to help your users find the MechJam 3 entries, SVGs of the jam's logos, and high-quality PNGs of the related jam logos. This pack is designed for any streamers or video creators who want to associate their content with MechJam 3. 

All entries that can be showcased can be found here: https://itch.io/jam/mechjam3/entries
